channel.title: [REQ] Certain Areas not PKable [REQ]
channel.description: I have searched and looked around and couldnt find this, but, right now I'm using Project 16 V.6 (Modded some, soon to be alot more :)); and am making it into a PK Server. How can I make like certain areas not being able to attack people (I.E. Varrock east and/or Dummies). Right now I have the PKing set as X 10112 and Y 2800. (So X 10112 being highest point in wildy just out in the water a little and the Y 2800 being beside Ape Atoll teleport out in the blackness.) Thank you in Advance. :D

item.title: [REQ] Certain Areas not PKable [REQ]
item.dc:creator: @worms_power worms power
item.description:
@worms_power wrote:

where to put it in

item.title: [REQ] Certain Areas not PKable [REQ]
item.dc:creator: @Aftermath.v2 Aftermath.v2
item.description:
@Aftermath.v2 wrote:

Enclose the function that actually does the attack in an if statement, so that if it’s in the area, send a message that attacking is not allowed in this area.

if ((abxX > x1) && (absX < x2) && (absY > y1) && (absY < y2)) {
sendMessage(“Attacking is prohibited in this area.”);
} else {
doAttack();
}

Read full topic
